item.title: Additive Manufacturing｜Introduction of Student 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing Association
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: The Chongqing University 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing Association was established in October 2015 and is considered an A-level student organization at the university. We belong to the esteemed College of Mechanical Engineering. Our main focus lies in promoting and advancing the field of 3D printing and additive manufacturing. The logo of our association Our dedicated laboratory for association activities Some works of our association Since our inception, we have been actively involved in research and development.

item.title: Additive Manufacturing｜Topology Design of Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Based on Multi-objective Optimization
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Out of interest, I joined my manufacturing course teacher Kun Li’s laboratory (HπAM of State Key Laboratory of Mechanical Transmission in Chongqing University) to learn about engineering analysis of additive manufacturing, mainly focusing on shape memory alloys and multi-objective based Optimal Thermal-Mechanical Coupling Structure Topology Design
